law.text: The cabinet may require that all aircraft operating from any airport, or other landing facility, within this state, shall be licensed with the cabinet. It may further require that all pilots operating aircraft from any airport or other landing facility within this state shall be registered with the cabinet. Provisions and fees for licensing of aircraft and registration of pilots shall be by regulations established by the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 10, effective March 25, 1960. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 165-51.
